name: Open Source Scheduling System (OSSS)
short_description:
The Open Source Scheduling System is a Work Order management system with integrated scheduling. OSSS manages both employees, customers and their work orders with scheduling and granular access control. OSSS offers traditional work order management as well as group based access control to provide granular access control. 
OSSS Also utilizes CalDAV(Tested with Baikal) to push orders to user calendars. 

Open Source Scheduling System is still under development and considered unstable. 

This project is licensed under the creative commons license.
